diseqc_send_timings_t Struct Reference

This structure defines the DiSEqC send timings. Each bit sent consists of 2 'chunks'. A 0 is defined as a long active chunk followed by a short inactive chunk. A 1 is defined as a short active chunk followed by a long inactive chunk.

Data Fields

  • IMG_UINT8 ui8ShortChunkWidth
  • IMG_UINT8 ui8LongChunkWidth
  • IMG_UINT16 ui16MasterEmptyTimeout
  • IMG_UINT16 ui16PostTransactionSilence

Field Documentation

IMG_UINT8 diseqc_send_timings_t::ui8ShortChunkWidth

Number of 22khz cycles for a short chunk. The default value is 11 (0.5ms).

IMG_UINT8 diseqc_send_timings_t::ui8LongChunkWidth

Number of 22khz cycles for a long chunk. The default value is 22 (1ms).

IMG_UINT16 diseqc_send_timings_t::ui16MasterEmptyTimeout

Maximum number of 22khz cycles the master FIFO can remain empty while data is still to be sent. If this timeout is reached the operation will fail with a status of DISEQC_STATUS_ERR_SEND_TIMEOUT. The default value is 0x84 (6ms)

IMG_UINT16 diseqc_send_timings_t::ui16PostTransactionSilence

Period of silence to place on the bus after every transaction (22khz cycles). The default value is 0x14A (15ms)
